snippet: The Swedish automaker is still years away from commercializing a plug-in hybrid in America, but missed no opportunities Monday to call itself a leader in hybrid technology.
abstract: The Swedish automaker is still years away from commercializing a plug-in hybrid in America, but missed no opportunities Monday to call itself a leader in hybrid technology.
lead_paragraph: Shown on Monday, Jan. 9: Volvo XC60 Plug-In Hybrid concept.

headline.main: With XC60 Plug-in Hybrid, Volvo Delivers a Rousing 'Me, Too'
